title: Zhen Dao Ge 3rd Season

synonyms: Zhen Dao Ge 3: Gucheng Bi Xue

synopsis:
After bidding farewell to the retired Marquis of Dingwu, He Fangzhi, together with the reclusive Zhou Luobin, continues their journey through the martial world to investigate the truth behind his father's corruption case. 

The two travel from the capital to Jiyang City, a key town on the Liaodong border. "The north wind sweeps across the land, breaking the white grass; in the eighth month of the lunar calendar, snow flies in the northern sky," and with the machinations of those behind the scenes, He Fangzhi is besieged by numerous martial arts figures. He Fangzhi and Zhou Luobin overcome numerous obstacles, and the truth behind He Fangzhi's old case and the martial world grudges with He Fangzhi's master in Sichuan, the "Knife Demon," are gradually revealed. 

In each bloody battle, the martial world and the imperial court, choices and perseverance, ideals and conspiracies—the martial world map of Zhen Dao Ge will slowly unfold.

(Source: Tencent, translated)
